announcement.kaziukoMuge: Kaziuko Muge 2026 is coming! March 6-8 in Vilnius

hero.title: Discover Authentic
hero.subtitle: Support local artisans from Lithuania. Each piece tells a unique story of tradition and craftsmanship.

unique.title: Unique Handmade
unique.description: Every item is crafted with care by skilled artisans, making each piece one-of-a-kind.

support.title: Support Local
support.description: Directly support talented Lithuanian makers and help preserve traditional crafts.

events.title: Events & Workshops
events.description: Join craft markets, workshops and exhibitions to meet makers and learn new skills.

kaziukoMuge.title: Kaziuko Muge 2026
kaziukoMuge.subtitle: Lithuania's Largest Traditional Craft Fair
kaziukoMuge.description: Join us at this historic annual fair celebrating Lithuanian craftsmanship. Meet our verified artisans in person and discover unique handmade treasures.

becomeMakerCTA.title: Become a Maker
becomeMakerCTA.subtitle: Share your crafts with thousands of customers across Lithuania and Europe. Join our growing community of talented artisans.

signUp.title: Create Account
signUp.subtitle: Join our community of artisans and craft lovers

makers.title: Meet Our Artisans
makers.subtitle: Discover talented makers from across Lithuania

verificationNotice.title: Verification Notice
verificationNotice.desc: We are currently contacting makers for verification before Kaziuko muge 2026 (March 6-8). Unverified makers are awaiting approval confirmation.

becomeMaker.title: Are you a Lithuanian craftsperson?
becomeMaker.desc: Join our growing community of artisans and share your traditional crafts with customers across Europe.

footer.description: Discover unique handcrafted goods from talented artisans across Lithuania.
footer.copyright: Crafts And Hands. Empowering Lithuanian craftspeople, one creation at a time.

returns.title: Returns & Refunds
returns.subtitle: Easy 30-day returns on most items

policy.title: Return Policy
policy.description: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not happy with your order, you can return most items within 30 days of delivery.
policy.eligibleDesc: Most items can be returned within 30 days of delivery in their original condition.
policy.nonEligibleDesc: Custom or personalized items, perishable goods, and items marked as final sale cannot be returned.

processSteps.step1: Contact us within 30 days of delivery
processSteps.step3: Ship the item back in original packaging

returns.contactDesc: Contact our customer support team for any return-related questions.

becomeMaker.title: Become a Maker
becomeMaker.subtitle: Join our community of talented Lithuanian artisans and share your craft with customers across Europe.

kaziukoNotice.title: Kaziuko Muge 2026 Registration Open
kaziukoNotice.desc: Apply now to get verified before Lithuania's largest craft fair (March 6-8). Verified makers will be featured prominently at the event.

benefits.freeSetup: Free shop setup and product listings

form.craftDescriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your craft techniques, materials you use, and what makes your work unique...
form.socialMediaPlaceholder: Instagram, Facebook, or your website URL
form.motivation: Why do you want to join?
form.motivationPlaceholder: Tell us about your craft and what makes it special...
form.agreeTerms: I agree to the terms and conditions and confirm that my products are authentic Lithuanian handcrafts

success.title: Application Submitted!
success.message: Thank you for your interest in joining Crafts And Hands. Our team will review your application and contact you within 5-7 business days.
